text: avarkalutaiya kaikal ceytu murpatuttiya(ti)vinai karanamaka, avarkalukku etenum cotanai varumpotu avarkal; "enkal iraiva! Ni enkalukkut tutar oruvarai anuppivaittirukka ventama? Appotu nankal un vacanankalai pinparri nankalum muhminkalil ullavarkalakiyiruppome!" Enru kuratirukkum poruttum (um'mai avarkalitaiye tutaraka anuppinom)
